mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COM_QUEST WHERE STATE = '1'

SELECT cq.NO, cq.MEMBER_NO, m.NICK AS MEMBER_NAME, cq.QUEST_NO, q.TITLE AS QUEST_NAME, cq.RATE, cq.IMG_PATH, cq.COM_TIME, q.CONTENT FROM COM_QUEST cq JOIN MEMBER m ON cq.MEMBER_NO = m.NO JOIN QUEST q ON cq.QUEST_NO = q.NO WHERE STATE = '1' OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT M.NICK AS MEMBER_NAME, CQ.NO, CQ.MEMBER_NO, CQ.QUEST_NO, CQ.RATE, CQ.IMG_PATH, CQ.COM_TIME, CQ.STATE, CQ.REJEC_REASON, Q.QUE_CATE_NO , Q.LOC_CATE_NO , Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.POINT, Q.ENROLL_DATE, Q.IMG_PATH, Q.LATITUDE, Q.LONGITUDE, Q.DEL_YN, Q.HEAD_CNT FROM COM_QUEST CQ JOIN MEMBER M ON CQ.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN QUEST Q ON CQ.QUEST_NO = Q.NO WHERE CQ.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE member m SET m.MEMBER_TITLE_NO = ( SELECT MAX(mt1.NO) FROM member m1 JOIN member_title mt1 ON m1.ACCUMULATE >= mt1.POINT WHERE m1.NO = m.NO ) WHERE m.NO = #{no}
